sect2.title: Introduction to GStreamer
sect2.para: The GStreamer package contains a streaming media framework that enables applications to share a common set of plugins for things like video decoding and encoding, audio encoding and decoding, audio and video filters, audio visualisation, Web streaming and anything else that streams in real-time or otherwise. It is modelled after research software worked on at the Oregon Graduate Institute.

sect2.title: Installation of GStreamer
sect2.para: Install GStreamer by running the following commands:

userinput.command: ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc \ --localstatedir=/var --disable-docs-build && make && make install && chown -R root:root /usr/share/doc/gstreamer-&gstreamer-version; && gst-register

sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: --localstatedir=/var: This switch puts gst-register's cache in /var/cache/gstreamer-0.8 instead of /usr/cache/gstreamer-0.8.
--sysconfdir=/etc: This switch puts configuration files in /etc instead of /usr/etc.
--disable-docs-build: This switch prevents the rebuilding of documentation during the make command.

chown -R root:root ...: The documentation is installed with ownerships of the user who untarred and built the package. This command changes the ownerships of the installed documentation files to root:root.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The GStreamer package contains gst-complete, gst-compprep, gst-feedback, gst-inspect, gst-launch, gst-md5sum, gst-register, gst-typefind, gst-xmlinspect, gst-xmllaunch, the libgstreamer, libgstcontrol and libgst libraries.

sect3.title: gst-complete
sect3.para: gst-complete is a utility enabling bash to provide context sensitive tab completion for gst-launch command lines.

sect3.title: gst-compprep
sect3.para: gst-compprep builds a registry of GStreamer elements and their features that is used by gst-complete.

sect3.title: gst-feedback
sect3.para: gst-feedback generates debug info for GStreamer bug reports.

sect3.title: gst-inspect
sect3.para: gst-inspect prints information about a GStreamer plugin or element.

sect3.title: gst-launch
sect3.para: gst-launch is a tool that builds and runs basic GStreamer pipelines.

sect3.title: gst-md5sum
sect3.para: gst-md5sum generates MD5 checksums of the data generated by a GStreamer pipeline.

sect3.title: gst-register
sect3.para: gst-register is used to register all the GStreamer plugins on the system. It creates a listing of their properties so that when a GStreamer based application is started, it does not need to load plugins until it needs them.

sect3.title: gst-typefind
sect3.para: gst-typefind uses the GStreamer type finding system to determine the relevant GStreamer plugin to parse or decode a file, and determine the corresponding MIME type.

sect3.title: gst-xmlinspect
sect3.para: gst-xmlinspect prints information about a GStreamer plugin or element in XML document format.

sect3.title: gst-xmllaunch
sect3.para: gst-xmllaunch is used to build and run a basic GStreamer pipeline, loading it from an XML description.
